name: Brobbot Slack Instance
description: A Brobbot instance for your Slack room.

BROBBOT_SLACK_TOKEN.description: Your API token for your Slack Hubot integration.

BROBBOT_ALIAS.description: An alias that your brobbot will also respond to (e.g. 'bb')

HEROKU_URL.description: The url for this Heroku app (e.g. http://my-slack-brobbot.herokuapp.com). Used to send a keep-alive ping to your instance.
